description:
A second-year student in the piloting department, who belongs to http://anidb.net/ch125790 [Grassley House]. Renee is one of the female students who support http://anidb.net/ch124443 [Shaddiq]. Though she seems lighthearted, she is a malicious person who behaves differently with boys than with other girls.
Source: Official page
name: Renee Costa
